creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
To reproduce:

- login as lenya
- go to site area
- call "Edit Navigation Title" (don't submit form)

- open another browser
- login as alice
- call "New XHTML document"

- go to lenya's browser
- submit the form

- go to alice's browser
- submit the form (actually this should raise an error)

=> lenya's changes are reverted

I added a failing test case:
modules/sitetree/java/test/org/apache/lenya/cms/site/tree/ConcurrentModificationTest.java
creator: andreas@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text:
The problem seems to be that the RCML lazy-loads its content without
modification check.
